General.Name: P&H Tech Co. Ltd.
General.Description: P&H Tech Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells organic light emitting diode (OLED) materials and catalysts. The company offers general, EBL, HTL, host, OLED intermediate and catalyst, and other organic synthetic materials. It sells its products to the OLED display market. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
General.Address: Daewoo Frontier Valley, Yongin, South Korea, 448-701
